When this writer asked Feith... which of the six regimes on the General Wesley Clark list were included in the Donald Rumsfeld paper, he replied,`` All of them.''
The Defense Department guidance document made it clear that US military aims in regard to those states would go well beyond any ties to terrorism.

Allen Iverson led the Nuggets with 30 points and Linas Kleiza had 16 points. Carmelo Anthony added 15 points and nine rebounds. Sen. Bernie Sanders , I-Vt., ordered the report in a provision he added to last year's defense spending bill. The measure also directed the Pentagon to recommend ways to punish fraudulent contractors. But the report concluded that the department believes that existing remedies with respect to contractor wrongdoing are sufficient. `` It is clear that DoD's current approach is not working and we need far more vigorous enforcement to protect taxpayers from massive fraud,'' Sen. American Idol's season-one co-host Brian Dunkleman admits to having been extremely freaked out the first time he saw Simon Cowell tell someone they should never sing again. It's one thing to watch it on television, but then you spend time with these kids and you have to look at them right in the eyes, and then their mother is looking at you, like,` What just happened?'?
